html:
12.28.18  2:20 pm   what will happen on january 5th?

     that is up to you, and me

12.28.18  2:04 pm   What's the best song you've created?

     i would prefer to make a new one to be the best

12.28.18  1:19 pm   people say i have really bad taste in music but isn't music subjective 

     yes

12.28.18  12:36 pm   have you ever thought of singing a song based off of a book?

     sure

12.28.18  12:08 pm   is your next song going to be an original one or a cover? im asking because you said that you would start doing covers of songs next month.

     i want to do covers but doing a video for it is a legal grey area that is much more complicated than i anticipated

12.28.18  11:40 am   is there any significant difference between traditional grip and matched grip? 

      it always seems that way if you are used to one or the other, but no

12.28.18  11:02 am   In rock and pop at least, is it safe to assume that most of the times the bass is playing the root on beat 1

     you can always listen and see, or if the bass player is you then you get to choose! or ask the leader/producer what they want you to do

12.28.18  11:00 am   are the songs in your "Music Videos" playlist on YT arranged so that the ones you thought came out the best come first? if not, what are they arranged by?

      i'm not sure. i don't really know how those things work. i just check the box of the lists i want the video to be included in when it's released

12.28.18  10:58 am   how to not worry about making money when you're broke ?

     become a hunter / gatherer

12.28.18  10:57 am   how to take oneself less seriously?

     take someone else more seriously?

12.28.18  10:51 am   do you have a harder time sleeping when you're in the middle of writing a song than when you're done writing and producing it?

     no

     do you ever dream about the song you're working on and get New ideas that jolt you awake? 

     more likely to get unrelated ideas. but no jolt awake. if already partly awake then it would be important to jolt out of bed to write it down, hope that makes sense

12.28.18  9:09 am   Is the universe too empty or too full? 

      both

12.28.18  9:04 am   how do you ground yourself if/when you find yourself getting a bit too existential and overwhelmed by the world and the things in the world and your life? and by you, i am referring to myself. 

     take a walk on the ground / walk across the ground. examine its groundful qualities, and grounditude

12.28.18  9:03 am   Why did the colour on the anagram page change from blue to link and never again? I know it was from 2015 to 2016 but then why didn't you change the other years?

     the pink ones are made from requests. the blue ones were not

12.28.18  7:59 am   Me and my roomate bonded a lot over your videos, thanks for that. Also do you think the philosophy of metaphysics is a waste of time?

      ah, that is a question for the philosophy of the philosophy of metaphysics

12.28.18  7:55 am   Best Douglas Adams work?

     the one with 42 in it

12.28.18  7:14 am   How do I know if I'm a good person?

     there is a buzzfeed quiz

12.28.18  7:12 am   I wish I could be a bird sometimes. Is that possible?

     i think so, but by the time you are one you might not remember wishing. at that point you will have to just accept that you once wished it. and by the same token, it would also be good to accept now that you once wished to be what you now are

12.28.18  7:08 am   did you work with the teevee?

     something better

12.28.18  5:44 am   How can I acquire Believability Bob's services?

     i don't know who that is, but the entire world around you will always be able to assess whether or not something is believable, and you will in turn be able to assess the believability of their assessment

12.28.18  5:43 am   what developments in your musical style, if any, have you made over the past while, and why did you make them?

     trying to get good / better, etc

12.28.18  5:35 am   If chapter 2 is "conforming to society, and doing it well" then what is chapter 1?

     the basics?

12.28.18  4:58 am   When you were singing about how you wanted to go outside did you go outside?

     no

12.28.18  4:47 am   My dreams and desires are not possible in reality, but I'm still stuck hoping for them and wanting them to happen. What should I do if I don't want to give up on them, but know I also won't be happy unless they happen?

      write some woeful tales of yearning and longing

12.28.18  4:43 am   Do you recommend learning sheet music? 

     there are 2 reasons you might want to do that. 1, if you think it would be enjoyable. and 2, if you wanna play someone else's music without listening to it first

12.28.18  3:39 am   Do you think art and artist should be separated?

     i think they're gonna get the best results if they are together

12.28.18  2:59 am   what is the most recent weird dream you've had that you can remember

     went to the store

12.28.18  2:00 am   what is your opinion on time zones?

     they are very nice

12.28.18  1:57 am   What makes you happy?

     anything

12.28.18  1:54 am   What would you do first if you were to die and become a ghost

     die

12.28.18  1:35 am   I was on this crazy self-discovery art quest, to get to know who I am. Except I disliked it and it sucks. I really hated and was bored / disappointed / grossed out by what I found. I'm not sad about it necessarily, but now I don't know what to do besides drink, and ask you for advice on what to do now. 

     you must talk through the details

12.28.18  12:39 am   why cant i remember how to read

     perhaps you forgot how to remember

12.27.18  11:39 pm   You get 1 wish. No wishing for more wishes. What's the wish?

     i've already gotten at least 1 wish, maybe more

12.27.18  11:08 pm   what determines whether or not you do live action for your videos ?

     me

12.27.18  11:05 pm   at a guess, what percentage of answers on this questions page are jokes, what percent are serious and what percent are both? also which category does this answer fall into?

     jokes are very serious, and seriousness, in turn, turns out to be quite a huge joke

12.27.18  10:22 pm   having trouble finding a comfortable way to solo over major 7th chords, any specific scales you normally use?

     i think if you play over Cmaj7 preteding like it's Eminor, i think you will be very happy and start to get a nice friendly picture of the situation

12.27.18  9:59 pm   do you take measures to ensure your rise in popularity doesn't affect your creative freedom?

     yes but i need to take some additional measures

12.27.18  9:42 pm   what do you think of palindromes ?

     wow

12.27.18  7:54 pm   Do you ever watch YouTube videos? If so who/ what do you like to watch?

     most of the content that i watch on youtube was probably not made for youtube but ended up on youtube anyway

12.27.18  7:50 pm   How do I find and realize my hidden super powers?

     write a novel about them

12.27.18  7:28 pm   do you think musical people have a more rhythmical cadence to their speech?

     virtually everything in this universe is a rhythmic cadence, unless you happen to be discriminating against some rhythmic cadences and not others

12.27.18  7:20 pm   In "Just Did a Bad Thing," around 0:30, you hit into a groove that I just can't get enough of. Seriously. Part of me wishes the song would continue longer with that groove. It feels a little different than some of your other releases. Less free jazz, more rock-like. Is this your music evolving, or are you just trying different things?

     hopefully both

12.27.18  6:44 pm   any ideas of how to notate melodies without staff paper?

     i notate it generally up and down in the empty space, to correspond to the ups and downs, and then i write numbers above each note. and i write the key letter at the top of the page and circle it

12.27.18  6:38 pm   how do you feel about green beans

     not green enough but that's ok

12.27.18  6:13 pm   Should i try when i know i will fail

     yes, you might catch a glimpse of success (which is often situated near by) in the process, which will therefore give you some inside information about how to get there next time

12.27.18  5:59 pm   how did you teach yourself piano?

     the piano seems to teach itself if it means that much

      do you recommend learning scales and things like that?

     songs!!!!! even if you make them up

12.27.18  5:47 pm   What's your opinion on Sphere ?

     could be round, etc

12.27.18  5:43 pm   life is weird?

     that's probably true

12.27.18  5:30 pm   In your new song, you use "as long as you believe in me," is this a reference to "Maybe I could eat Blades Of Grass."

     no

12.27.18  5:18 pm   what do you think about the argument that people make that some of the Pop songs are "repetitive" and have "the same chords" and have "the same chord progressions" and that the chords are "too simplistic".

I don't think I agree with that.

What do you think?

     i think it's a convincing argument and i think those songs will likely heed that advice and stop being popular
